attributes.action: Make broadband available in rural areas without the additonal cost of unwanted landline rental
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you live in a rural area, you have to pay about £15 a month for unwanted landline rental on top of your ISP charges - ie double what town-dwellers pay - and you still get a worse service than urban dwellers.  Is this 21st Century communications in Britain? Britain?
